PASSIVE: Immune to All types of Regeneration Rate Modification except due to Poison.
The Potency of all Bleed Effects is reduced by 50%
RAGE - PASSIVE: Weapon X gains a Rage Charge each time he’s Struck, one of his Abilities fails to trigger due to Chance, or a Debuff is Purified off the Opponent.
Gaining Rage Charges as well as all of the Berserk Rage Effects are unaffected by Ability Accuracy Reduction.
At 25 Rage Charges Weapon X snaps and enters a Berserk Rage lasting until his Rage Counters reach 0.
Upon entering Berserk Rage Weapon X goes Unstoppable for 4 seconds.
As long as he’s Berserk, and not Unstoppable, Weapon X’s Rage falls off one at a time, falling off faster the longer he’s been Berserk.
After Weapon X’s Berserk Rage ends all of its associated effects immediately end, and Weapon X cannot gain Rage Charges for 20 seconds.
BERSERK RAGE EFFECTS - PASSIVE: Weapon X gains the following bonuses while in Berserk Rage:
Gain +87 Attack.
100% Chance when Struck to gain a Regeneration Passive healing 100% of the Hit Damage taken, over 5 seconds.
100% Chance when Struck to gain a Fury Passive granting +130.5 Attack, for 5 seconds. Max: 1 Stack.
Immune to All Stun Effects.
All Attacks become Unblockable.
ATTACK MISSED OR EVADED - PASSIVE: Gain +2 Rage Charges.
100% chance to go Unstoppable for 1 seconds.
ALL ATTACKS: 50% chance to cause a Bleed Debuff dealing 13.05 Direct Damage over 5 seconds. With 10+ Rage this ability’s chance to trigger increases to 100%.
WHEN ATTACKED: While not in a Berserk Rage 50% Chance when Struck to gain a Regeneration Passive healing 40% of the Hit Damage taken, over 5 seconds.
WHEN CHARGING A HEAVY ATTACK: If Weapon X has any Rage Charges he gains a Passive Unstoppable for 1.50 seconds, then going on Cooldown for 10 seconds.
HEAVY ATTACKS: If below 10 Rage Charges double current Rage Charges.
Refresh all Bleed Effects on Opponent.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: Gain +5 Rage Charges.
If at or above 15 Rage Charges, go Berserk.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: While Berserk gain +43.5 Attack.
100% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 87 Direct Damage over 5 seconds.
If this attack doesn’t Hit gain +5 Rage Charges.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: While Berserk each Hit pauses Rage fall off for 1 second(s).
If triggered while not Berserk gain up to +65.25 Attack based on Rage.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Gain Rage Charges up to 25 and then go Berserk.
100% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 87 Direct Damage over 15 seconds.

SPECIAL ATTACK 2: While Berserk each Hit pauses Rage fall off for 1 second(s).
If triggered while not Berserk gain up to +677.25 Attack based on Rage.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Gain Rage Charges up to 25 and then go Berserk.
100% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 903 Direct Damage over 15 seconds.

PASSIVE: Immune to All types of Regeneration Rate Modification except due to Poison.
The Potency of all Bleed Effects is reduced by 50%
RAGE - PASSIVE: Weapon X gains a Rage Charge each time he’s Struck, one of his Abilities fails to trigger due to Chance, or a Debuff is Purified off the Opponent.
Gaining Rage Charges as well as all of the Berserk Rage Effects are unaffected by Ability Accuracy Reduction.
At 25 Rage Charges Weapon X snaps and enters a Berserk Rage lasting until his Rage Counters reach 0.
Upon entering Berserk Rage Weapon X goes Unstoppable for 4 seconds.
As long as he’s Berserk, and not Unstoppable, Weapon X’s Rage falls off one at a time, falling off faster the longer he’s been Berserk.
After Weapon X’s Berserk Rage ends all of its associated effects immediately end, and Weapon X cannot gain Rage Charges for 20 seconds.
BERSERK RAGE EFFECTS - PASSIVE: Weapon X gains the following bonuses while in Berserk Rage:
Gain +1204 Attack.
100% Chance when Struck to gain a Regeneration Passive healing 100% of the Hit Damage taken, over 5 seconds.
100% Chance when Struck to gain a Fury Passive granting +1806 Attack, for 5 seconds. Max: 1 Stack.
Immune to All Stun Effects.
All Attacks become Unblockable.
ATTACK MISSED OR EVADED - PASSIVE: Gain +2 Rage Charges.
100% chance to go Unstoppable for 1 seconds.
ALL ATTACKS: 50% chance to cause a Bleed Debuff dealing 180.6 Direct Damage over 5 seconds. With 10+ Rage this ability’s chance to trigger increases to 100%.
WHEN ATTACKED: While not in a Berserk Rage 50% Chance when Struck to gain a Regeneration Passive healing 40% of the Hit Damage taken, over 5 seconds.
WHEN CHARGING A HEAVY ATTACK: If Weapon X has any Rage Charges he gains a Passive Unstoppable for 1.50 seconds, then going on Cooldown for 10 seconds.
HEAVY ATTACKS: If below 10 Rage Charges double current Rage Charges.
Refresh all Bleed Effects on Opponent.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: Gain +5 Rage Charges.
If at or above 15 Rage Charges, go Berserk.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: While Berserk gain +602 Attack.
100% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 1204 Direct Damage over 5 seconds.
If this attack doesn’t Hit gain +5 Rage Charges.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: While Berserk each Hit pauses Rage fall off for 1 second(s).
If triggered while not Berserk gain up to +903 Attack based on Rage.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Gain Rage Charges up to 25 and then go Berserk.
100% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 1204 Direct Damage over 15 seconds.

5+1.sig_info: Berserk Rage’s Cooldown Duration decreases by 2 to 7 second(s).

BERSERK RAGE EFFECTS - PASSIVE: Weapon X gains the following bonuses while in Berserk Rage:
Gain +68 Attack.
100% Chance when Struck to gain a Regeneration Passive healing 100% of the Hit Damage taken, over 5 seconds.
100% Chance when Struck to gain a Fury Passive granting +102 Attack, for 5 seconds. Max: 1 Stack.
Immune to All Stun Effects.
All Attacks become Unblockable.
ATTACK MISSED OR EVADED - PASSIVE: Gain +2 Rage Charges.
100% chance to go Unstoppable for 1 seconds.
ALL ATTACKS: 50% chance to cause a Bleed Debuff dealing 10.2 Direct Damage over 5 seconds. With 10+ Rage this ability’s chance to trigger increases to 100%.
WHEN ATTACKED: While not in a Berserk Rage 50% Chance when Struck to gain a Regeneration Passive healing 40% of the Hit Damage taken, over 5 seconds.
WHEN CHARGING A HEAVY ATTACK: If Weapon X has any Rage Charges he gains a Passive Unstoppable for 1.50 seconds, then going on Cooldown for 10 seconds.
HEAVY ATTACKS: If below 10 Rage Charges double current Rage Charges.
Refresh all Bleed Effects on Opponent.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: Gain +5 Rage Charges.
If at or above 15 Rage Charges, go Berserk.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: While Berserk gain +34 Attack.
100% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 68 Direct Damage over 5 seconds.
If this attack doesn’t Hit gain +5 Rage Charges.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: While Berserk each Hit pauses Rage fall off for 1 second(s).
If triggered while not Berserk gain up to +51 Attack based on Rage.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Gain Rage Charges up to 25 and then go Berserk.
100% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 68 Direct Damage over 15 seconds.

PASSIVE: Immune to All types of Regeneration Rate Modification except due to Poison.
The Potency of all Bleed Effects is reduced by 50%
RAGE - PASSIVE: Weapon X gains a Rage Charge each time he’s Struck, one of his Abilities fails to trigger due to Chance, or a Debuff is Purified off the Opponent.
Gaining Rage Charges as well as all of the Berserk Rage Effects are unaffected by Ability Accuracy Reduction.
At 25 Rage Charges Weapon X snaps and enters a Berserk Rage lasting until his Rage Counters reach 0.
Upon entering Berserk Rage Weapon X goes Unstoppable for 4 seconds.
As long as he’s Berserk, and not Unstoppable, Weapon X’s Rage falls off one at a time, falling off faster the longer he’s been Berserk.
After Weapon X’s Berserk Rage ends all of its associated effects immediately end, and Weapon X cannot gain Rage Charges for 20 seconds.
BERSERK RAGE EFFECTS - PASSIVE: Weapon X gains the following bonuses while in Berserk Rage:
Gain +94 Attack.
100% Chance when Struck to gain a Regeneration Passive healing 100% of the Hit Damage taken, over 5 seconds.
100% Chance when Struck to gain a Fury Passive granting +141 Attack, for 5 seconds. Max: 1 Stack.
Immune to All Stun Effects.
All Attacks become Unblockable.
ATTACK MISSED OR EVADED - PASSIVE: Gain +2 Rage Charges.
100% chance to go Unstoppable for 1 seconds.
ALL ATTACKS: 50% chance to cause a Bleed Debuff dealing 14.1 Direct Damage over 5 seconds. With 10+ Rage this ability’s chance to trigger increases to 100%.
WHEN ATTACKED: While not in a Berserk Rage 50% Chance when Struck to gain a Regeneration Passive healing 40% of the Hit Damage taken, over 5 seconds.
WHEN CHARGING A HEAVY ATTACK: If Weapon X has any Rage Charges he gains a Passive Unstoppable for 1.50 seconds, then going on Cooldown for 10 seconds.
HEAVY ATTACKS: If below 10 Rage Charges double current Rage Charges.
Refresh all Bleed Effects on Opponent.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: Gain +5 Rage Charges.
If at or above 15 Rage Charges, go Berserk.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: While Berserk gain +47 Attack.
100% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 94 Direct Damage over 5 seconds.
If this attack doesn’t Hit gain +5 Rage Charges.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: While Berserk each Hit pauses Rage fall off for 1 second(s).
If triggered while not Berserk gain up to +70.5 Attack based on Rage.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Gain Rage Charges up to 25 and then go Berserk.
